text: Va sazovor nest, ki mu'minon hamagi rahsipor [-i cihod] savand. Pas, caro az har guruhe az onon iddae rahsipor namesavand [va iddae niz hamrohi pajomʙar namemonand], to [ʙa saʙaʙi onci az mahzaras faro megirand] dar in ogohi ʙijoʙand va qavmi xudro vaqte ʙa sujason ʙozgastand, ʙim dihand? Bosad, ki onon [az kajfari ilohi ʙitarsand va] ʙiparhezand
